Articles.Content: Playing KSP again with mods this time.  So far I only have TAC lifesupport.  What is the other version of mech jep without autopilot?  I want to do a Mun lander with correct dv per stage for each major burn but I don't want to enter it all by hand into my spreadsheet.  Also what is the mod that allows you to build stuff in space? KOS?  SOrry for bothering I have been searching and have not been able to figure it out.

Just now, Nich said:

What is the other version of mech jep without autopilot?

MechJeb.

Or you could use Kerbal Engineer.

15 minutes ago, Nich said:

 Also what is the mod that allows you to build stuff in space? KOS? 

I'm pretty sure you want KIS http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/101928-105-kerbal-inventory-system-kis-123/ 

or extraplanetary launchpads http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/54284-105-extraplanetary-launchpads-v5294-exp/

And welcome back.
It's an older, somewhat dated thread but it still contains a lot of useful links: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/50701-community-mods-and-plugins-library/

• KIS (Kerbal Inventory System) to allow engineers to modify rockets in flight using tools (bolt new parts on, take old parts off).
  • Extraplanetary Launchpads to be able to build & launch rockets elsewhere from KSC.
  • KER (Kerbal Engineer Redux) for lots of info such as "what's my dV".  Provides info rather than autopilot.
Mod questions moved to the modding subforum.
